description:
Colgate Total Antibacterial Charcoal Deep Clean Toothpaste active cleaning formula fights plaque between teeth and hard to reach places and provides a superior clean with stronger 12 hour bacterial defense

Colgate Total Antibacterial Fluoride toothpaste has a unique formula that keeps your whole mouth healthy by fighting bacteria on teeth tongue cheeks and gums for 12 hours Colgate Total Charcoal Deep Clean active cleaning formula fights plaque even between teeth and hard to reach spaces

A Healthier You

Every day we make it our mission to get you feeling your best and we believe a healthy mouth makes a difference in being ready for whats ahead
So we are truly excited that youve chosen us to help you step forward confidently into life with a smile thats healthy as can be

Colgate Total Whole Mouth Health Toothpaste helps to

Prevents cavities
Remove plaque
Protect enamel
Prevent tartar buildup
Freshen breath
Whiten teeth
Protect gums

No Colgate Toothpaste contains Sugar Colgate Total toothpaste are also Vegan Gluten Free and Responsibly Made

Recommended by The Australian Dental Association ADA New Zealand Dental Association NZDA

Boxed contents 1 Toothpaste
Size 115g

With 4 weeks of continuous use
vs a regular fluoride toothpaste
vs ordinary nonantibacterial fluoride toothpastes with 4 weeks of continued use
>
WHOLE MOUTH HEALTH Brushing with Colgate Total Toothpaste will help improve your teeth tongue cheeks and gum health

STRONGER 12HOUR BACTERIAL DEFENSE Use Colgate Total Antibacterial Toothpaste for a stronger 12 hour bacterial defense

CHARCOAL DEEP CLEAN active cleaning formula fights plaque between teeth and hard to reach spaces

CAVITY PROTECTION Formula helps to remove plaque with brushing and prevents buildup of cavities and tartar

ADDITIONAL BENEFITS Freshens breath protects gums and enamel
name: Colgate Total Charcoal Deep Clean Antibacterial Toothpaste 115G
